Html:
Hi, 

i have a problem with vs2010 and cristal report.

I created a module to display reports but when I add a view of the module and insert the CrystalReportsViewer the following statement fails:

moduleCatalog.AddModule (typeof(NunaSolutions.Module.Reports.ReportsModule));

says missing a using or namespace,

can anyone help?

thanks

Hi,

I believe your problem could be related to the one discussed in the following thread:

  • SAP Crystal Reports for Visual Studio 2010 - "Namespace name not found"

There an user proposed that this could be fixed by setting the target Framework to 4.0, not the client version and also, setting your platform target to either X86 or X64 ,but not Any.

I hope you find this handy,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami

thank you very much for the reply, resolved.

 

Diego.
